703136f-a.text:
Corner of Bay 32nd St. & Cropsey Ave., B'klyn. Harper [sic; Harbor] Hospital at right.
May 28, 1939
P.L. Sperr, photographer
703136f-a.folder: Bay 32nd Street & Cropsey Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703906f-a.text:
Cropsey Avenue, at and adjoining the southeast corner of Bay 32nd Street, showing an old home at the corner and the Harbor Hospital adjoining the corner house.
P. L. Sperr  May 28, 1939
703906f-a.folder: Cropsey Avenue & Bay 32nd Street, Brooklyn, NY
